blog about

Pola Schwöbel




I am a postdoc working with probabilistic machine learning at the Technical University of Denmark, Department of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science. I am part of the Section for Cognitive Systems, in Søren Hauberg's group, who was also my advisor during my PhD. I am interested in Bayesian methods, invariance learning and algorithmic fairness.
